sentences: Noh, lase keelel juba käia! Mis see tühi asi sul siis öelda põle! Noh?
Minu keel käib vabalt eesti keelt.
context: In Estonian, 'käib' is the third-person singular form of the verb käia. It means something flows or goes without stopping, often used metaphorically to describe speech flowing freely or language being spoken fluently. The word can also refer to circulation or functioning.
